name: Baitaca
description: '''Baitaca''', artistic name of '''Antônio César Pereira Jacques''' (born December 23, 1965), is a Brazilian singer and songwriter known for his traditional "[[Brazilian gaucho music|gaúcho]]" music style. In his compositions, some lyrics carry double meanings and tell stories about life in rural settings. He experienced a resurgence in 2019 with the song ''"[[Do Fundo da Grota (song)|Do Fundo da Grota]],"'' which gained popularity through [[Concert|live performances]] by singers during the [[COVID-19 pandemic|2020 pandemic]]. His repertoire includes other hits like ''"A História do Tico Loco," "Baitaca Com Seu Jeito Simples,"'' and ''"Querido Encanta a Todos."''
